definition: from the west, moving toward the west, the winds from the west that occur in the temperate zones of the Earth
details:
adverb
- from the west
= example: from the west
- toward the west
= example: toward the west
= synonyms: westward
adjective
- moving toward the west
= synonyms: westward
- of wind
= synonyms: western
noun
- the winds from the west that occur in the temperate zones of the Earth
= synonyms: prevailing westerly
